faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: To create an account, click on 'Sign Up', enter your details, and verify your email.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Account Settings', scroll down, and click the 'Delete Account' button. Please be aware that this action is irreversible.

faqs.question: What happens if I forget my email?
faqs.answer: Go to the 'Forgot Email' page and submit your phone number to receive an OTP to recover your account.

faqs.question: How do I update my profile information?
faqs.answer: To update your profile information in the Profile section navigate to 'Edit Profile' to edit your details.

faqs.question: Can I save my favorite projects?
faqs.answer: Yes! Click the 'Save' button on any project to add it to your favorites.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can use the Enquiries form on the 'Contact' page. Alternatively, you can send a message through the online chat at the bottom of the page.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data is encrypted and stored securely. Visit the 'Your Data' section in the Profile section to learn more about how we use and protect your information.

faqs.question: How do I participate in the community chat?
faqs.answer: You need to log in and navigate to the 'Community Forum' from within the Profile section to join discussions with other users.

faqs.question: Is the site accessible?
faqs.answer: Yes, the site is designed with accessibility in mind, including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

faqs.question: What happens if I am banned?
faqs.answer: If your account is banned, you will lose access to all site features. If you believe this was a mistake, contact support for review.

faqs.question: What if I can't access my account or the site is down?
faqs.answer: First, check your internet connection and try clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, check our status page or contact support.

faqs.question: What happens if there is abuse in the forum?
faqs.answer: Report any abusive behavior using the 'Report' button. Moderators will review the report and take appropriate action, including warnings or bans.
